section.heading: Jubilee Ontario Apartments, LP, Lot 805, Square 2565.
section.text: The portion of Lot 805 in Square 2565, located at 2525 Ontario Road, N.W. ("Property") that is used for nonresidential purposes, shall be exempt from real property taxation so long as the residential portion of the Property continues to be exempt from real property taxation pursuant to ยง 47-1005.02.
